popularityCurve.label: michael has the experience and vision to lead the mta capital construction company at a time when the need for our transportation megaprojects is clear

clusterList.phrase: michael has the experience and vision to lead the mta capital construction company at a time when the need for our transportation megaprojects is clear

our blue-ribbon panel on construction excellence looked at how to complete construction projects on time and within budget during a time of rising commodity prices local labor shortages and a weak dollar michael's extensive experience vision and innovative outlook will enable us to implement the ideas the panel generated he will take over from the very capable ronnie hakim who did a terrific job leading the agency through this period of transition
